h2-training: Find Your Team and Get on the Field!
p-training-1: At Aalborg Flyers, we have teams for all ages and skill levels â€“ from the very youngest to experienced seniors. Whether you're brand new or have been playing for years, there's a place for you.
p-training-2: Under our junior and senior team sections, you'll find an overview of training times, skill levels, and what to expect.
p-training-3: Not sure which team is right for you? Under each team, you'll find contact information for the coach, who is ready to answer your questions and help guide you in the right direction.
